name: Respect
description: Value every process, difference, and individual potential with sincere good intention

name: Accountability
description: Act responsibly and consistently, upholding commitment and integrity

name: Determination
description: Embrace the journey with perseverance, patience, and a strong drive to grow

name: Yield Gratitude - Result
description: Cultivate gratitude as the foundation for positivity, resilience, and appreciation of every achievement

name: Awareness
description: Be mindful of your impact, and act with empathy, integrity, and good intention
